data.seo_title: Oxford Pennant's Partners: Oxford Pennant has worked with brands all over the world including: Nike, J.Crew, Harley Davidson, and more!
data.seo_description: We want to work with you too!

teaser.html: We worked alongside J. Crew's product and design teams to develop an exclusive set of tees and banners inspired by inspired by vintage Americana. All 100% Made in the U.S.A.
Nike asked us to develop 16 unique banners celebrating Michael Jordan's biggest milestones. The pieces are on display at Nike's global headquarters.

image.alt: Nike office headquarters, Jordan neon light and banners

teaser.html: Hey-ey-ey-ey! We started the 2020-21 Buffalo Bills season with a partnership idea for custom banners to celebrate wins. We closed it out with 19 dubs, giant pennants on WNY's tallest building and more than $38,000 raised for charity.
A collection of products that celebrate positivity, inclusion and love. Inspired by and made alongside the wonderful Kelle Hampton.
Daren Magee creates art around themes of positivity, community and human introspection. A collection of products that feel right for the times.
As an ongoing partnership with the band, we've designed and operated multiple retail experiences celebrating everything Wilco. We even painted a mural in downtown Chicago!
You can't claim to be from Buffalo, NY without knowing every word to "Name" and we proved it with a store takeover in honor of our hometown heroes.

Concept to creation, box to banner, logistics and loving every minute of it. We helped Capital One celebrate the talented folks in their OnePatent program with a custom "thank you" kit on this all-hands, top-to-bottom project.

Pennants have long been part of biker culture. We worked with the Harley-Davidson Museum to pay tribute to this rich tradition by recreating classic flags, plus designed a number of custom pennants that celebrate American innovation.
